title: City boy’s ideas vs. farm gal’s pride—tempest brews! The Green Promise 1949

sources.title: City boy’s ideas vs. farm gal’s pride—tempest brews! The Green Promise 1949
sources.description:
Deborah Matthews battles her father’s iron will ways and a raging storm to save their farm, while Susan Matthews braves the flood to rescue trapped livestock. With David Barkley’s guidance, the family learns that teamwork and modern methods are the keys to survival.

Directed by William D. Russell

Main cast:
Marguerite Chapman - Deborah Matthews
Walter Brennan - Mr. Matthews
Robert Paige - David Barkley
Natalie Wood - Susan Anastasia Matthews
Ted Donaldson - Phineas Matthews
Connie Marshall - Abigail Matthews
Robert Ellis - Peter "Buzz" Wexford
Jeanne LaDuke - Jessie Wexford
Irving Bacon - Julius Larkins
Milburn Stone - Rev. Jim Benton
Geraldine Wall - Mrs. Wexford

Genres: Colorized, Drama
Release date: 1949
Filming location: Millwood, USA

B&W version: https://youtu.be/EIX72Xys_p8

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
